GapFillInput.Title: Daily routines
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type a word or phrase with a verb in the past tense into each gap.

Content.Question: I had a bad night last night. First of all I finished work late and came|got|arrived home at nine. My husband Henry was away on business. I felt|was very tired and so I decided to go to bed early. I had a shower and then got into|went to bed. I set my alarm for 7 o'clock in the morning, turned off|switched offthe light and I soon fell asleep. In the middle of the night I woke up suddenly. I turned on|switched on the light and checked the alarm clock. It was only 12 o'clock but I heard a noise downstairs. Igot out of bed, got dressed quietly, and went downstairs. I felt|was very scared. I opened the kitchen door. It was Henry!
